mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ledger Book of Dr. Thomas Howard 1885-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The ledger book of Dr. Thomas Howard from August 1885 - October 1902. In the ledger are the handwritten records of each patient's name, when they payed their bill, the amount, and how they payed. How payment was received could include "Cash" or "4 Bushels Buckwheat" or other goods, with an equivalent dollar amount.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Doctors
Record keeping
Records (Information)
